author: Z.B. Steele
description:
In equal parts profound philosophy and cynical foreshadowing, Ruocchio has delivered an all time great sequel in Howling Dark. Intensely interesting world-building, some great character work, and an ending that will shake readers to the core, Howling Dark improves on the already great start of Sun Eater and marks the arrival of one of the […]

The post REVIEW: Howling Dark by Christopher Ruocchio appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Howling Dark by Christopher Ruocchio
